comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: $$ - FOR SALE - $$ * Renovators Delight * Charming older-style turn-of-the-century inner-city split-level-living cottage in sought-after by rats area with intact original features and possibly Sydney Harbour glimpses. Walls of traditional Australian country-style pressed metal. Sash windows with some original C19th glass work. Native organic hardwood floorboards showing the irreplaceable patina of age. Cross-flow ventilation - no need for air-conditioning. Sun-drenched balcony. Leafy outlook. Compact easy-maintainace backyard. Space for BBQ entertaining area. Plenty of locally available on-site fuel for the BBQ and/or wood-fired pizza oven. Room for Victorian-style garage. Close to industrial area, slums, and rat-infested wharves. P.O.A. This one won't last! Be quick! Contact Agent @ State Records NSW

comment._content: Looks like it may be part of an old shipwrights or other waterfront business. Looking a bit like Balmain Birchgrove area.
